subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Andre Dawkins scored a career-high 28 points in his first start to help Duke beat Bradley, 83-48, moving Coach Mike Krzyzewski into sole possession of third place on the all-time wins list.
snippet: Andre Dawkins scored a career-high 28 points in his first start to help Duke beat Bradley, 83-48, moving Coach Mike Krzyzewski into sole possession of third place on the all-time wins list.
